Confirmation from Detroit police spokesp: but upon investigation, no bricks were found at one site and the bricks at the other site were for a construction project.
Fact: checking organizations, including Snopes, Factcheck.org, and the Associated Press, debunking similar claims about pallets of bricks being staged during previous riots and protests.
